OpenHD/OpenHD

Transmits video and telemetry over Wi-Fi adapters

Related repos

  • MiniCPM-o: open-source model that understands images, video, text, and audio, supports real-time conversations and live streaming
  • Owncast: open source, self-hosted live video streaming and chat server
  • IoT platform for device management and automation
  • Processes drone imagery into maps and 3D models
  • open firmware for IP cameras
  • Transmits network packets over radio via USB CDC ECM ethernet adapter
  • Turns cameras into Linux webcams
  • Low latency remote desktop and game streaming stack for Linux
